content.query:
SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'https://hallincdatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/hallinc/raw/csv/products/products2.csv',
    FORMAT = 'csv',
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0')
WITH (
    product_id INT,
    product_name VARCHAR(20) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
    list_price DECIMAL(5,2)
) AS rows
